carpet.rule.Fixlongoverflow.name: Fix Entity X Coordinate Crash
carpet.rule.Fixlongoverflow.desc: Fixing the issue where retrieving the entity's x-coordinate value within the range [33554414.0, 33554434.0) causes the game to crash with an IllegalArgumentException.
carpet.rule.MinecartMotionFix.name: Reintroduce 1.21 Minecart Momentum Transfer Across Dimensions
carpet.rule.MinecartMotionFix.desc: Ports the feature from versions 1.21-1.21.1 where minecars carrying passengers transfer their momentum to passengers during the teleport tick when crossing dimensions to version 1.21.2 and above
